description.value:
Special: Daemon Wep, Crippling (3), Razor-Sharp, Toxic (6), Crippling (6)

Note: Weapon: Embedded Spike. Daemon WP 62 (Slaaneshi Daemon), Bind Str 2 . Att.: Envenomed, Piercing, Voidchill, Wounding. Weapon is embedded into Character's Arm, it cannot be dropped, disarmed, or parried. Removing it requires Opposed -30 Medicae vs Daemon's Willpower, if fail suffer 1d5 damage per DoF. Requires Mark of Slaanesh to wield. Add 6 to any Critical Damage dealt by weapon, deals 1d10 nonpermenant Toughness Damage.
